sig_info: Thunder God’s Wrath is enhanced to provide +15.6 to 70.8 Attack Rating.
Additionally, each Shock Debuff on the opponent causes them to suffer -20% Ability Accuracy.

ALWAYS ACTIVE - SHOCK EFFECTS: Incoming Shock effects suffer -90% duration.
Each time Thor inflicts a Shock Debuff he has a 16% chance to also inflict a Stun Debuff lasting 2 seconds.
Each time Thor inflicts a Shock Debuff he has a 45% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing an Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 685.71 for 10 seconds.
BOON OF THE GODS: Each time Thor gains 40 hits on his Combo Meter, or is struck 20 times he gains a Boon of the Gods Passive. Max: 2 stacks.
Boon of the Gods fills Thor’s Power Meter over 6 seconds and is unaffected by Ability Accuracy reductions.
If Thor is struck by a Special Attack, Boon of the Gods is removed.
WHEN OPPONENTS INTERCEPT THOR\u2019S DAS: 30% chance to Auto-Block the attack. This Block is considered Well-Timed and can activate the Parry Mastery.
WHEN AN ATTACK INFLICTS A STUN: If the opponent has an Armor Break Debuff, the attack deals a burst of additional Physical Damage equal to 250% of the damage dealt by the attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 75% chance to inflict a 1.80 second Stun Debuff.
If at a Combo Meter of 40+ chance is instead 100%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing 1 Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 1066.67 for 16 seconds.
This Armor Break Debuff is Paused while Boon of the Gods is active.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: This attack cannot deal more than 20% of the opponent’s Max Health in damage. This damage cap is increased to 30% if the opponent is suffering from an Armor Break Debuff.
100% chance to inflict a Shock Debuff, causing 93.6 Energy Damage over 10 seconds.

100% chance to gain a Thunder God’s Wrath Passive lasting 30 seconds which is unaffected by Ability Accuracy Reductions. While active, contact with the opponent has a 40% chance to inflict a Shock Debuff, causing 70.2 Energy Damage over 5 seconds.

SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 75% chance to inflict a 1.80 second Stun Debuff.
If at a Combo Meter of 40+ chance is instead 100%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing 1 Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 1333.33 for 16 seconds.
This Armor Break Debuff is Paused while Boon of the Gods is active.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: This attack cannot deal more than 20% of the opponent’s Max Health in damage. This damage cap is increased to 30% if the opponent is suffering from an Armor Break Debuff.
100% chance to inflict a Shock Debuff, causing 1429.2 Energy Damage over 10 seconds.

100% chance to gain a Thunder God’s Wrath Passive lasting 30 seconds which is unaffected by Ability Accuracy Reductions. While active, contact with the opponent has a 40% chance to inflict a Shock Debuff, causing 1071.9 Energy Damage over 5 seconds.

sig_info: Additionally, each Shock Debuff on the opponent causes them to suffer -20% Ability Accuracy.
Thunder God’s Wrath is enhanced to provide +256.64 to 1568.75 Attack Rating.

ALWAYS ACTIVE - SHOCK EFFECTS: Incoming Shock effects suffer -90% duration.
Each time Thor inflicts a Shock Debuff he has a 16% chance to also inflict a Stun Debuff lasting 2 seconds.
Each time Thor inflicts a Shock Debuff he has a 45% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing an Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 878.57 for 10 seconds.
BOON OF THE GODS: Each time Thor gains 40 hits on his Combo Meter, or is struck 20 times he gains a Boon of the Gods Passive. Max: 2 stacks.
Boon of the Gods fills Thor’s Power Meter over 6 seconds and is unaffected by Ability Accuracy reductions.
If Thor is struck by a Special Attack, Boon of the Gods is removed.
